movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a task to plant an idea in a target's subconscious.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who recounts the historical events he inadvertently influenced.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado to the magical land of Oz, where they embark on a journey to meet the Wizard.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn her home into winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man to break the spell.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
